title: Protesters March in Washington Against Covid-19 Vaccine Mandates
sub_head: Studies show that vaccines and boosters offer superior protection from recent variants of the coronavirus
body:
Protesters rallied in the nationâ€™s capital Sunday against government mandates for Covid-19 vaccinations, a sign of the challenges for public-health officials looking for ways to persuade more Americans to get the shots.
Protesters marched along the National Mall and gathered in front of the Lincoln Memorial, despite cold temperatures Sunday morning.
